sent.orig: I swear, (oh man whatever) I swear man!
"I swear I'm innocent. I swear on the head of my children I'm innocent.
sent.trans: “我发誓，我是清白无辜的，我拿我的孩子发誓，我是清白无辜的。

sent.orig: I hate hearing swear words although sometimes I do swear.
sent.trans: 尽管有时候我骂脏话，但我还是不太喜欢听到粗言秽语的。

sent.orig: Nero: Kyrie, Kyrie! I swear, I swear I'm going to get us out of here!
sent.trans: 我发誓，我发誓我们会一起离开这里的！

sent.orig: I know it's hard not to swear when your feelings get working.
sent.trans: 我知道，脾气一上来，不骂娘，确实不容易。
